entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
